mapper.select: SELECT f.contentid,f.title,f.areacode,f.eventstartdate,f.eventenddate,f.tel,f.addr1,f.mapx,f.mapy,f.createdtime,f.updatedate,f.firstimage,f.firstimage2,f.mappoint,left(d.infotext,100) as infotext FROM festival f left outer join detailinfo d on f.contentid = d.contentid WHERE d.contentid=#{contentid}

SELECT * FROM festival WHERE
areacode=#{areacode} and
eventstartdate <= #{eventstartdate} and eventenddate >= #{eventenddate} and addr1 not like '%온라인%' and mapx is not null order by contentid desc LIMIT #{key_offset}, 6
SELECT * FROM festival WHERE areacode=#{areacode} AND eventstartdate <= #{eventstartdate} AND eventenddate >= #{eventenddate} ORDER BY eventstartdate desc
SELECT * FROM festival WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT ${page}, 12
SELECT CEILING(count(*)/12) FROM festival WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT f.contentid,f.title,f.areacode,f.eventstartdate,f.eventenddate,f.tel,f.addr1,f.mapx,f.mapy,f.createdtime,f.updatedate,f.firstimage,f.firstimage2,f.mappoint,f.view_cnt,left(d.infotext,100) as infotext FROM festival f left outer join detailinfo d on f.contentid = d.contentid WHERE eventstartdate <= #{eventstartdate} and eventenddate >= #{eventenddate} and addr1 not like '%온라인%' and mapx is not null
and concat(title,addr1) like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY ST_DISTANCE_SPHERE(ST_GeomFromText(concat('POINT(',#{mapy},' ',#{mapx},')'),4326), mappoint) asc LIMIT #{key_offset}, 12

SELECT count(*) FROM festival WHERE eventstartdate <= #{eventstartdate} and eventenddate >= #{eventenddate} and addr1 not like '%온라인%' and mapx is not null
and concat(title,addr1) like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival (contentid,title,areacode,eventstartdate,eventenddate,tel,addr1,mapx,mapy,createdtime,firstimage,firstimage2) VALUES (#{contentid},#{title},#{areacode},#{eventstartdate},#{eventenddate}, #{tel},#{addr1},#{mapx},#{mapy},#{createdtime},#{firstimage},#{firstimage2}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE title=#{title},areacode=#{areacode},eventstartdate=#{eventstartdate}, eventenddate=#{eventenddate},tel=#{tel},addr1=#{addr1},mapx=#{mapx},mapy=#{mapy},updatedate=SYSDATE(), firstimage=#{firstimage}, firstimage2=#{firstimage2}
